After visiting other popular and non-popular dental centres, I decided to go ahead with Dr. Sridhar.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
This was my first visit at this clinic. I was immediately given the registration form and within 5 minutes taken to the consulting area. I had gone in to get a few cavities filled. Dr. Sridhar clearly explained the situation of my teeth and told me for now fillings will suffice ,but in the future, may habe to go with root canal and crown. After the consultation, a junior doctor was assigned with performing the cavity filling procedure. She was very careful and patient when cleaning one tooth which was a bit sensitive. Handling sensitivity was my biggest fear with getting dental work done. But this doctor took extreme care to make sure I wasn't too uncomfortable. After it was done , since the cavity was at the edge of my tooth, I was briefed on the things to keep in mind for if the filling came off very soon. 
Overall a great experience. Highly recommend this clinic and the doctors here.
He is explaining the problem of my kid teething issues very clearly and he is very friendly with his patients. Staff are also very friendly.

Since I had a very bad tooth ache ,visited Dental360 which was near by to my place.Dr.Sridhar checked my teeth and took an xray to check the status of infection. He educated me very well about my problem and advised root canal followed by cap for support.procedure was painless but was worried because doctor took 3_4 appointments for the completion of rct, due to long standing infection appointments were more than required for regular case.whatever finally my tooth pain was gone and got my tooth capping after couple of days by Dr.Prem.thank you for all to be so kind and caring

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Very friendly and professional behavior. Understood my problem quite quickly and gave me appropriate explanations to fix the issue

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Teeth Replacement with Implants in three days,
review:
Visited for my mother's loose teeth,  Dr.Sridhar advised few X-rays
and gave options for removable teeth set and fixed teeth with implants.
Initially my mother was scared about the implant procedure but she was very happy after the treatment
as she had minimal pain and she is very much happy now with her smile
and enjoying her favourite food.The hygiene of the equipment they maintained was also very good.

I was scared a lot about getting dental treatments before I came here considering I had to get a lot of work done including Root canals, extractions and fillings but the staff was so caring and the dentist was so gentle with everything. 

The best part apart from all, everyone so helpful and guided me in understanding the common mistakes to be avoided, I mean its kind of preventive treatment for me.

I have attended Dr. M Sridhar and Dr. Sindhura today for my Cavity filling. When I have approached other doctors in town they had just checked with Torch light and said Root Canal Treatment(RCT) is required. But this Doctor has taken X-Ray and advised , for now, we don't need any RCT as the cavity is not deep, we can go with Filling. His suggestion really helped me . Treatment was also given with utmost care and I will Highly recommend them to anyone.

Had been experiencing excessive pain in gum and molar tooth. I was explained all the alternatives in detail to take my own decision. Along with options, the pros and cons were also clearly explained. The procedure was far less painful than I had expected. Although I still have 2 more sessions planned, but I am already satisfied and happy with the service and consultation.

Got root canal treatment in one sitting. I am very satisfied with the treatment.Doctors are very professional. Hygienic clinic. Highly recommended . I felt the charges are comparatively reasonable as I enquired multiple clinics and had experience with dental treatments before also.

Very professional and didn't find the need to over blow the problem to increase procedure complexity or recommend issues that are not needed to be acted upon. Very pleasant experience especially after a very bad one a week back. Would recommend him to family and friends.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I consulted Dr. M. Sridhar for Gums Infection. He is very friendly & very experienced. Staff is following COVID Precautions. I would definitely recommend Dr. M. Sridhar for others.

review: The doctor did a dental checkup and clearly explained the root cause of my pain due to tooth sensitivity. Also, he advised me to take preventive measures for the several cavities and to monitor the condition of my wisdom teeth. I opted for a filling session for one of the cavities (which was performed by one of his colleagues) and a full cleanup. I was satisfied with this experience.

review:
*** ******* ** **** ************* *** ********* Speaking with him helped me in getting over the fear of surgery. 
Surgery room was spacious. This was definitely a plus point for me as I am claustrophobic. 
Surgeon was very patient with my questions. He explained the procedure properly. Extraction was done in 5 minutes.
Written leaflet with post surgery care and precautions was provided which helped in quicker recovery.
Entire process was very smoother than I expected.

review:
Entire team is fabulous and they really care about their patients.....they always suggest the best option of treatment to everyone. 
Dr. M Shridhar and team are amazing in terms of maintaining hygiene, cleanliness and waiting time.

So beautiful. So elegant. Just looking like a wow ! 
I got my Root Canal here and it has been a very smooth and amazing experience ! 
Would definitely recommend !

I went for a filling replacement.

I felt the clinic was not very hygienic, the toilet didn't even have soap! I was attended to by some junior doctor, instead of Dr. M Sridahr, she seemed confident in the beginning but then kept asking me about whether the filling "felt" fine, although she should have been able to see that! 

Also, I was told the entire filling will be replaced, but I saw that only 1/4 of it was replaced but I was charged the whole fee nonetheless. My previous filling was pale white but this one is stark white and so conspicous! 

I'll give them 3/5, **** ******* ** *** *** * ***** *** *** ***** *** ****** *** ***** ** ** ****** I may not go here for a bigger job though.

Visited Dental360 since I had a very bad tooth pain.Dr.Sridhar specialist in rct advised me rct in order to save the tooth and relieve from pain.Instruments were clean sterilized.Doctor handled with care and treatment was painless.thank you Dr.Sridhar and staff

Since I had a severe tooth pain got check up in Dental360 by Dr.Sridhar .Doctor said to get root canal in order to save the tooth,I got convinced with the treatment that has to be done in multiple sittings .pain n swelling has come down and injection given was painless.prices are reasonable ,thank you Dr.Sridhar and team

I visited Dental360 since my tooth was paining very badly associated with swelling in gum region.Dr.Sridhar checked my teeth and said that tooth is in bad condition but still we can save your tooth by rct and takes 2_3 sittings more compared to regular rct.Before visiting Dental360 I have gone for other clinic they advised removal of the tooth, I got scared and visited Dental360 for the treatment. I'm quite happy and comfortable with the treatment. Thank you Dr.Sridhar and staff

Had a great experience in Dental 360.Dr.Sridhar explained me about my dental problems and gave enough knowledge about the problem. I'm suffering from very bad tooth ache since 2 days so my uncle suggested Dental360 .I went to clinic got the check up done with Dr.Sridhar and explained the problem in detail .doctor didn't rushed for treatment instead was done step by step accordingly. So Dr.Sridhar checked my teeth and advised teeth cleaning since gums were little swollen associated with bleeding.So I got cleaning also doctor gave instructions that has to be followed while brushing etc.thank you Dental360 and team for such a good service

I was suffering from severe tooth pain and sleepless nights so one of my friend advised Dental360 .I visited the clinic got xray for the tooth after that Dr.Sridhar started root canal for the tooth and did in three sittings because of infection.I got relieved from the pain and slept well after going home.thank you Dr.Sridhar and Dental360 team

I had a tooth sensitivity problem fr past so many days so I visited Dental360 for the treatment. Dr.sridhar checked my teeth and advised cleaning and fillings for few teeth .I got the treatment done with the dental team now I'm feeling good.thank you Dental360

I was looking for laser gum treatment with experienced doctor and  reasonable price ,so I got consultation with Dr sridhar he advised me laser gum surgery.treatment was done by Dr vamshi gum specialist with minimal discomfort .I'm so thankful for the doctors and staff for being so kind and patience

Since my tooth got discolored I visited clinic for teeth whitening Dr prem checked my teeth and advised rct .so I got my rct with Dr sridhar was cool and painless .so clinic has all specialities and treatments are done by specialists.I highly recommend to all

I'm new to the place so worried a lot about tooth cavity.I got dental check up in one of the near by clinic they advised me rct ,so I thought ask my friend for second opinion she said about Dr sridar who is root canal specialist in dental 360.so I got check up with sir he said no need of rct just fillings are sufficient so I'm very happy with the diagnosis and treatment .so doctor is so good, treatments are done if required only, finally I should be thankful to my friend and Dr sridhar.‚ò∫

Before visiting dental 360 I got check up with other dentist he advised tooth removal I got scared thinking about removal so I came dental 360 for second opinion Dr sridhar explained me about the chances of saving tooth so as a root canal specialist he did his job of conserving tooth I'm able to eat properly no pain and mobility of tooth has come down slowly .nw m completely recovered from tooth pain ‚ò∫

I was very hesitant to visit a dentist as many had scared me abt dental procedures.however Dr sridhar and his team explained me and the details n procedures I would need very we'll, which gave me confidence that I was in good hands.further doctor din't rushed for completion of procedures instead took time and did accordingly .after completion of rct der wz no more pain m so happy n can do my regular food intake without any restrictions.thank you sir

After a lot of opinions from various dentists I wz convinced with Dr sridhar,I came for rct.he showed me d actual process of rct through videos step by step .treatment was done in 2 sittings with no pain with advanced low radiation xray technique ,also doctor explained me about other dental problems and advised to get dental check up for every 6 months .I'm glad I choose to visit dental 360‚ò∫‚ò∫‚ò∫

review: All three doctors, Dr. Shridhar, Dr. Guru and Dr. Priya are amazing, friendly and the best in their profession. I had my wisdom tooth extracted, which I was much scared to go through. However, my treatment was painless and stress-free. I highly recommend them for your any tooth related problem.

If they are giving appointment for Dr. Sridhar, then at least he should meet patient once or provide details for all doctors , so that patients can choose :)
But doctor who attended me was good (I don't know her name bcoz it wasn't mentioned anywhere). Cost for bridge adhesive is not justified .
